scripts.serve:swagger:
yarn pull:swagger; echo "
\033[32mSwagger running at:
\e[0m- http://localhost:80
";docker run -p 80:8080 -e URLS_PRIMARY_NAME=Compose -e URLS="[{ url: 'docs/system.yaml', name: 'System' }, { url: 'docs/compose.yaml', name: 'Compose' }, { url: 'docs/messaging.yaml', name: 'Messaging' }]" -e VALIDATOR_URL= -v `pwd`/swagger:/usr/share/nginx/html/docs/ swaggerapi/swagger-ui
